bossam.app
Interface IReasonerFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReasonerFactory
public interface IReasonerFactory

Reasoner Factory Interface. Use this interface to create a reasoner.

Since:
2005. 10. 26.
Version:
$Id: IReasonerFactory.html,v 1.3 2007/01/24 08:49:29 zebehn Exp $
Author:
ZEBEHN

Method Summary
 IReasoner createOwlDlReasoner()
          Creates a new OWL DL reasoner.
 IReasoner createOwlDlTrHReasoner()
          Creates a new OWL DL TR/H Reasoner.
 IReasoner createReasoner()
          Creates a new reasoner.
 IReasoner createSwrlReasoner()
          Creates a new Swrl reasoner.
 IReasoner createSwrlTrHReasoner()
          Creates a new SWRL TR/H Reasoner.
 

Method Detail

createReasoner

IReasoner createReasoner()
Creates a new reasoner.

Returns:
a reasoner

createOwlDlReasoner

IReasoner createOwlDlReasoner()
Creates a new OWL DL reasoner. OWL DL reasoner can deal with not only OWL documents but also rules and facts.

Returns:
an OWL DL reasoner

createSwrlReasoner

IReasoner createSwrlReasoner()
Creates a new Swrl reasoner. Swrl reasoner should be used for SWRL reasoning.

Returns:
an SWRL reasoner

createOwlDlTrHReasoner

IReasoner createOwlDlTrHReasoner()
Creates a new OWL DL TR/H Reasoner.

Returns:
an OWL DL TR/H Reasoner

createSwrlTrHReasoner

IReasoner createSwrlTrHReasoner()
Creates a new SWRL TR/H Reasoner.

Returns:
an SWRL TR/H Reasoner
